urls.title: Technology in use for more than a century may be key in coronavirus fight
urls.description: THE technology has been in use for more than a century, but now a Scots health campaigner has said urgent research is needed into the use of…

text: @Haggis_UK @campbellclaret #MarrShow In fact PPE? We know how to  disinfect ward air. See  2003NewScientist & 2015Nature:-In Ward trials>97% efficacy @ reducing infectivity on Wards.
